				[8038] heading '5.0 out of 5 stars Most enjoyed game system in our house'
					[8039] link '5.0 out of 5 stars Most enjoyed game system in our house'
						StaticText '5.0 out of 5 stars'
						StaticText 'Most enjoyed game system in our house'
				[8044] heading 'Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2025'
				StaticText 'Style: Console'
				StaticText 'Color: Black'
				[8049] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText 'I mean, what’s not to like? All sorts of fun games of all genres available to play, on your tv, or on the go. You will accidentally play away hours of your day with this thing and have a lot of fun with your kids when you do. We have had no issues with ours and own two now. The battery lasts long enough and it’s also easy to just plug it in and keep going, when playing away from the tv/dock.'
				StaticText '4 people found this helpful'
				[8073] button 'Mark Review As Helpful'
					StaticText 'Mark this review as helpful BUTTON'
				[8094] link 'Report review by MM'
			[8095] listitem ''
				[8102] link 'Oreo'
					StaticText 'Oreo'
				[8110] heading '5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Gaming Experience on the Go!'
					[8111] link '5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Gaming Experience on the Go!'
						StaticText '5.0 out of 5 stars'
						StaticText 'The Ultimate Gaming Experience on the Go!'
				[8116] heading 'Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2024'
				StaticText 'Style: Console'
				StaticText 'Color: Black'
				[8121] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText 'The Nintendo Switch remains a revolutionary console, and this version with the Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy-Cons is as vibrant and fun as ever. It seamlessly transitions between handheld, tabletop, and TV modes, offering unmatched versatility for gamers of all ages.'
				StaticText "The Joy-Cons are ergonomically designed, and their detachable functionality makes multiplayer gaming a breeze. The system's performance is solid, with fast load times and crisp graphics that bring your favorite games to life. Whether you’re exploring vast open worlds in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, racing with friends in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, or engaging in fitness fun with Ring Fit Adventure, the Switch delivers consistently amazing experiences."
				StaticText 'Its portability is a standout feature, allowing you to take your gaming anywhere without compromising quality. The battery life is decent, and the build quality ensures the console can handle everyday wear and tear. This bundle is perfect for both seasoned gamers and newcomers alike. A definite must-buy!'
				StaticText '11 people found this helpful'
				[8147] button 'Mark Review As Helpful'
					StaticText 'Mark this review as helpful BUTTON'
				[8168] link 'Report review by Oreo'

				[8190] heading 'Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2025'

				[8195] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText 'My kids love playing the Switch. The best thing is that we all can play as family. It is easy to bring vacations.'

			[8239] listitem ''
				[8246] link 'Devante'
					StaticText 'Devante'
				[8254] heading '5.0 out of 5 stars Why did I wait so long to buy one.'
					[8255] link '5.0 out of 5 stars Why did I wait so long to buy one.'
						StaticText '5.0 out of 5 stars'
						StaticText 'Why did I wait so long to buy one.'
				[8260] heading 'Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2024'
				StaticText 'Style: Console'
				StaticText 'Color: Black'
				[8265] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText "First and foremost if you're considering buying one of these do it. I honestly don't know why I waited so long to buy one. I've always been a playstation player but as of late there hasn't been much new content leaving me to not use my PS5 pretty much at all these days so I figured Nintendo is still dropping news games so I'll check out switch. And boy am I glad did, this thing is a charm. The switch being able to be played handheld or played on tv is a cool concept and gives me plug and play vibes which I loved as a kid. Which means that if I'm on the road or just want to lay back and game I can just hold it and play. It connects to TV almost instantly when put in dock which is good and controllers don't seem to have connectivity issues when far away. I would recommend buying a controller if you have relatively bigger hands as the joycons aren't that big and the joycon that comes with it doesn't really help. Some cool controllers would be from Power A which is where I got mine. But a few things to watch out for is the space. The switch only comes with about 30 GB worth of space so definitely make sure to buy a SD Card as you'll only be able to have about 1 game if you don't. And two, something that isn't the Switches fault which is why I won't deduct stars is how expensive the games are, you'll be spending around $60-$70 for most games even ones that have been out for more than 5 years(but thats typical for most companies)."
				StaticText '16 people found this helpful'
				[8287] button 'Mark Review As Helpful'
					StaticText 'Mark this review as helpful BUTTON'
				[8308] link 'Report review by Devante'
			[8309] listitem ''

				[8324] heading '5.0 out of 5 stars Bad story turned good'
					[8325] link '5.0 out of 5 stars Bad story turned good'
						StaticText '5.0 out of 5 stars'
						StaticText 'Bad story turned good'
				[8330] heading 'Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2025'
				StaticText 'Style: Console'
				StaticText 'Color: Black'
				[8335] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText "I ordered a like new switch, and when it arrived it was in very bad condition, but customer support reached out about the issue after I already sent a bad review. I'm changing the review because the customer support was the best I've had. They offered a replacement for everything that was broken and a nintendo online 12 month membership for free. Now that I have everything, It works great. It still has some deep surface scratches on the switch itself, but it's fine."
				StaticText '8 people found this helpful'

					[8395] link '5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Worth the Splurge !'
						StaticText '5.0 out of 5 stars'
						StaticText 'Fun and Worth the Splurge !'
				[8400] heading 'Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2025'
				StaticText 'Style: Console'
				StaticText 'Color: Black'
				[8405] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText 'I have been missing the Wii for years and when I found out about the switch after waiting several months I decided it was worth the splurge. I love the quantity of fitness games available on the device, Zumba, sports, boxing, etc. I of course got the classic Mario Kart too. My friend has the light which is cool but I think the switch is so much better and worth the splurge when it comes to gaming with multiple people or the games that involve activities and standing at a distance. It’s been easy to figure out how to use. Super fun!'
				StaticText '5 people found this helpful'

				[8464] heading '5.0 out of 5 stars Best Thing l ever bought and don’t regret it.'
					[8465] link '5.0 out of 5 stars Best Thing l ever bought and don’t regret it.'
						StaticText '5.0 out of 5 stars'
						StaticText 'Best Thing l ever bought and don’t regret it.'
				[8470] heading 'Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2025'
				StaticText 'Style: Console'
				StaticText 'Color: Black'
				[8475] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText 'I recently bought a Nintendo Switch, and I’m really glad I did. It’s incredibly versatile—I love being able to play on the TV when I’m home and then switch to handheld mode when I’m out or just want to relax in bed. The setup was simple, and the controls feel smooth and comfortable. I’ve already gotten into a few games, and the graphics and gameplay are impressive for such a compact system. What really stands out is how easy it is to play with others, whether online or in person. It’s brought a lot of fun into my routine, and I find myself looking forward to game nights more than ever. This was definitely a great purchase.'
				StaticText '12 people found this helpful'

				[8545] link 'Verified Purchase: Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon'
					StaticText 'Verified Purchase'
				StaticText 'The Nintendo Switch is an amazing console that’s perfect for gaming at home or on the go. The versatility of switching between handheld and docked modes is a game-changer, and the Joy-Cons are comfortable to use, whether attached or separated. The game library is fantastic, with plenty of options for both casual and hardcore gamers. The build quality is solid, and setup was quick and easy. Whether you’re playing solo, with friends, or on the road, the Switch delivers a fun and seamless experience. Totally worth it!'
